alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 9:36PM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze to less one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Washington, Warren, Hamilton and Northern Herkimer Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Saturday to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix of sleet and freezing rain will move into the advisory area Saturday night and eventually change to all snow by the afternoon into the early evening with falling temperatures into the teens and 20s.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren
